message: I'm checking out Chicago co-op workspaces for rent and I'm hoping to find some that are pet friendly. I know, a tall order, but do any of you have ideas? There are a few listed at the Desktime (which is a great resource by the way): http://desktimeapp.com/cities/chicago. But some of them are just telling you that the owners keep their dogs around, not that you can bring yours.
